text: Piton is a rock climbing tool Piton or Pitons may also refer to: *Piton (beer), a Pilsner beer from Saint Lucia *Pitons, two mountainous volcanic plugs in Saint Lucia: Gros Piton and Petit Piton *Piton, Mauritius, a region in Rivière du Rempart District **Piton State College, a school in Piton, Mauritius *Mons Piton, an isolated mountain on the Moon *Pitons, cirques and remparts of Reunion Island, a UNESCO World Heritage Site *Piton Island, Curzon Islands, Antarctica == See also == * * *Carbet Mountains, Pitons Du Carbet, Martinique *Piton de la Fournaise, a volcano in Réunion *Piton de la Petite Rivière Noire, a mountain in Mauritius *Piton des Neiges, a volcano in Réunion *Piton Sainte-Rose, a town in Réunion
title: Piton (disambiguation)
